title: Universal Internet Access
description: In 2023, 100% of both the male and female population in Saudi Arabia used the Internet, indicating universal internet access.

title: High Losses Due to Theft and Vandalism
description: In 2022, Saudi Arabian firms reported losses due to theft and vandalism amounting to 61.9% of their annual sales, one of the highest in the world.

title: Minimal Use of Combustible Renewables and Waste
description: In 2022, only 0.003% of Saudi Arabia's total energy came from combustible renewables and waste, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Low Percentage of Firms Offering Formal Training
description: In 2022, only 3.9% of firms in Saudi Arabia offered formal training, one of the lowest rates worldwide.
